channel.title: Posts on Ryan McGill
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ryan McGill

item.title: Auburn University engineering student developing translation technology for sign language
item.description: Ryan McGill worked over the summer at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology Lincoln Laboratory, where his team, named ENVOY, or Enabling Natural-language Versatility and Opportunity, won the lab’s Intern Innovative Idea Challenge. Read more here.

item.title: MIT Lincoln Laboratory: Meet the Interns
item.description: Meet Ryan M. “The Lab is so open to learning! The knowledge center and the lending library offer tools to better your understanding of a topic, enabling you to apply it in a creative way.” Read more here.
